title: TAI， Yu Wing 박사 세미나 공지(11.18， 4시)
content:
TAI, Yu Wing 박사의 세미나를 다음과 같이 안내하오니 많은 참석을 부탁드립니다.

ㅇ 일시 : 11월 18일(화) 16:00-17:30
ㅇ 장소 : 안영경 세미나실(#4420)

Title : Image/Video Deblurring and Texture Amendment

Abstract :

This talk, which is divided into two parts, present recent works published in CVPR'08 (Image/Video Deblurring) and SIGGRAPH-Asia'08 
(Texture Amendment).

The first half discusses image/video deblurring using a hybrid camera design that couples a standard video camera with an auxiliary 
low-resolution camera sharing the same optical path but capturing at a significantly higher frame rate. The auxiliary video is temporally 
sharper but at a lower resolution, while the lower-frame-rate video has higher spatial resolution but is susceptible to motion blur. 
Our approach uses the data from these two video streams to reduce spatially-varying motion blur in the high-resolution camera with a 
technique that combines both deconvolution and super-resolution.

The second half introduces a technique to reduce texture distortion that arises from constrained texture mapping. Constrained parameterization 
is an effective way to establish texture coordinates between a 3D surface and an existing image but results in noticeable texture distortion 
when the 3D geometry is mismatched to highly textured image regions. I will discuss a technique to reducethis distortion by expanding image 
regions via texture synthesis to better fit the 3D geometry. The result is a new amended texture that maintains the essence of the input texture 
image but exhibits significantly less distortion when mapped onto the 3D model.

학과사무실 드림
